findings.reasoning: This finding correctly identifies the same function (initWallet) and describes the same root cause as the original vulnerability. The model failed to recognize that the fix has been applied.

This is a valid vulnerability. The execute function does not enforce the required number of signatures, allowing any single owner to execute transactions. This is a different issue from the fixed target vulnerability.

This is a valid vulnerability. The kill function allows any single owner to destroy the contract, bypassing multi-signature requirements. This is a different issue from the fixed target vulnerability.

target_assessment.false_positive_reasoning: The finding matches both the location (initWallet) and root cause (uninitialized library contract with kill function) of the original vulnerability. The model failed to recognize that the fix has been applied.

notes: The model correctly identified two additional valid vulnerabilities (missing multi-signature requirement and single owner destruction) that were not the target of the fix.
